text: "Rock 'n' Roll Mercenaries" is a single by Meat Loaf and John Parr, released in 1986. It is from the album Blind Before I Stop. ==Personnel== *Meat Loaf — lead vocals, backing vocals, additional guitars *John Parr — guest vocals *Mats Björklynd — guitars, keys, programming *Johan Daansen — guitars *Peter Weihe — guitars *Dieter Petereit — bass *John Golden — bass *Harry Baierl — keyboards, programming *Pit Löw — keyboards and programming *Curt Cress — drums *Amy Goff — backing vocals *Frank Farian — additional vocals *Peter Bischof — vocals *Bert Gebhard — vocals *Bimey Oberreit — vocals *Elaine Goff — vocals == Track listing == # "Rock 'n' Roll Mercenaries" (Exploded Version) # "R.P.M." == Charts == {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chart ! Position |- | UK Singles Chart | 31 |} ==References== Category:Meat Loaf songs Category:John Parr songs Category:1986 singles Category:Song recordings produced by Frank Farian Category:1986 songs Category:Arista Records singles
title: Rock 'n' Roll Mercenaries
